summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Boots Essentials Cucumber 3 Minute Clay Mask 50 ml.
Review Date: 2016/09/02
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 1.9 x 1.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This was my first time trying this clay mask. I use a lot of Boots products. They always are being reviewed and  talked about on tv. I would like to say this doesn't make my face break out. I have very sensitive skin. I would say that my skin is very smooth and refreshed after I use it. I am allergic to dust and my face always breaks out when I am doing housework. That being said I do something other may not I put this on so that the dust doesn't get on my face and it works even better then I thought . 3 minute wait time is about all I have with 2 kids 2 dogs
Review Title: Awesome and Refreshing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Foxbrim Ultimate Renewal Scar Cream - For Stretch Marks and Scars - Vegan Formula With Peptides, Plant Stem Cells, Vitamin E & Nutrient Rich Oils - 1OZ
Review Date: 2016/11/24
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.25 x 4.24 x 1.25 inches; 0.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'URSC-31', 'UPC': '636173656579 785479203021'}
Review Text: I will have to use more but first two times using it have seen a change. I think that not only on my scars but also on stretch marks. I would highly recommend this product above others. This arrived on time and in good shape. It was raining out and the package was fine.
Review Title: Great Product Improvement almost immediatly
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Purest Naturals Coconut Milk Body Scrub Polish - Best 100% Natural Exfoliator Moisturizer For Cellulite Stretch Marks, Eczema, Acne & Varicose Veins - Dead Sea Salt, Almond Oil & Vitamin E
Review Date: 2017/02/11
Store: Purest Naturals
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 3 inches; 10 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PN-CMBS', 'Manufacturer': 'Purest Naturals'}
Review Text: Love this product and love the way my skin feels after using it. First love the smell of codconut. Second it isnt as harsh as some of the body scrubs I have used in the past. I would highly recommend this to all
Review Title: Love this very soft skin
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '3.38 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.77 x 2.17 x 4.92 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SKSF004-100'}

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a clear preference for skincare products that emphasize sensitivity and natural ingredients, as seen in their high ratings for gentle products like clay masks and coconut scrubs. Most reviews reflect a focus on skin irritation concerns, highlighting a need for hypoallergenic formulations, especially given the individual's sensitive skin and proactive measures against environmental allergens. 

Common themes include the use of moisturizing and nourishing properties, suggested by positive responses to products designed for scars and hydration. Contrarily, there is a notable rejection of unsuitable moisturizers, as indicated by a low rating for a product that caused a negative skin reaction.

In terms of quality preferences, the individual favors products that are gentle and effective, consistently mentioning satisfaction regarding the after-use feel or results. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as they express willingness to try various products as long as they perform well and provide desired results.

Overall, their core preferences emphasize gentle, effective, and natural skincare solutions that accommodate sensitive skin, alongside a cautious approach to trying new products while maintaining watchfulness for skin reactions.

target_interaction.title: For my Daughter
target_interaction.text: These are perfect for my daughter since they are smaller and vibrant the work well with her hands . Not such a mess. The vibrant colors are a must this year and makes her fell pretty
